review: Very easy hookup and install.  I used my iPad for the install procedure and to cast information from the iPad to our flat screen TV.  I had also ordered a USB cable to connect from the Chromecast to a USB power. However no USB port was available on the TV but wound up using the included power supply and cable and plugged into AC power. Casting to the Chromecast has limitations but it works well for internet provided content if you do not have a "Smart" TV
author: CNJ01 "Joseph Calusio"

review: There's no point in having this, tbh.
author: alicia deer

review: I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND IF YOU DO NOT HAVE FAST INTERNET (~25MBPS) , WILL BE CHOPPY PLAYING VIDEOS.

review: It works and is very versatile.  Anything that can be viewed on the Chrome browser can be seen on my t.v.

review: What can I say, this product is solid to use, and has proven to be a convenient addition to the playing of media from a multitude of sources including Netflix,MLB-TV and Youtube to name a few.

review: It could only get better if it had head phones like Roku 3. I have both units.
